# RPEnsemble

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a fork of the package RPEnsemble (created by my supervisor Timothy Cannings), to incorporate extra functionality for supervised dimension reduction and sufficient subspace identification.

## Installation

You can install this development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cobrbra/RPEnsemble")
```
